channel.title: Projects on Ronak Sengupta
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ronak Sengupta

item.title: Project 1: Spam Mail Detector
item.description: Created a tool that detect spam mails becuase spam has been a major problem in day-to-day lifes of a customer. Naive Bayes classifier algorithm has been used on the context classification of each email, with a strong assumption that the words included in the email are independent of each other. Built a client facing API using Flask. Link to GitHub Repository
